Devel::TypeTiny::Perl58Compat(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Devel::TypeTiny::Perl58Compat(3)

NAME

Devel::TypeTiny::Perl58Compat - shims to allow Type::Tiny to run on Perl 5.8.x

STATUS

This module is considered part of Type-Tiny's internals. It is not covered by the Type-Tiny stability policy.

DESCRIPTION

This is not considered part of Type::Tiny's public API.

Currently this module just has one job: it patches re to provide a "is_regexp" function, as this was only added in Perl 5.9.5.

BUGS

Please report any bugs to <http://rt.cpan.org/Dist/Display.html?Queue=Type-Tiny>.

AUTHOR
